articles.title: Myanmar court jails Suu Kyi, Australian economist for 3 years - source - Reuters
articles.description: A court in military-ruled Myanmar on Thursday jailed deposed leader Aung San Suu Kyi and her former economic adviser, Australian Sean Turnell, for three years for violating a secrets law, a source familiar with the proceedings said.

articles.title: Half a trillion in wealth wiped from Australian households in three months - Sydney Morning Herald
